abstract.p: Gloebel Marketing Associates merges with Waly Klein & Associates to form Blu Granite Advertising and Marketing; Yazim in New York acquires Gregory Communications and Financial Communications Associates and merges them into Gregory FCA; Manning Selvage & Lee acquires Deeley Trimble & Co; company will be renamed Deeley Trimble/MS&L; Hill & Knowlton, part of WPP Group, acquires Rockey Company and SocketPR for undisclosed sum (M)

block.p: Goebel Marketing Associates in Greensboro, N.C., and Walt Klein & Associates in Winston-Salem, N.C., merged to form Blu Granite Advertising and Marketing, an agency offering strategic marketing, business development and creative work.

Goebel Marketing Associates in Greensboro, N.C., and Walt Klein & Associates in Winston-Salem, N.C., merged to form Blu Granite Advertising and Marketing, an agency offering strategic marketing, business development and creative work.

The merged unit has 85 employees; offices in Denver, Fort Lauderdale, Milwaukee, Philadelphia and Winston-Salem; and billings estimated at $22 million from clients like Johnson & Johnson and Tylenol. Bill Goebel, 50, becomes chief executive; he had been chief executive at Goebel Marketing. Walt Klein, 60, becomes president; he had been chief executive at Walt Klein.

Yazam in New York acquired and merged two communications agencies for stock and cash. The two -- Gregory Communications in Ardmore, Pa., specializing in public relations, and Financial Communications Associates in Ardmore, Pa., focusing on investor relations -- will be known as Gregory FCA.

Manning, Selvage & Lee in New York, a public relations agency that is part of the B Com3 Group, acquired Deeley Trimble & Company in Atlanta, which specializes in internal marketing and workplace communications. Deeley Trimble will be renamed Deeley Trimble/MS&L.

And Hill & Knowlton in New York, part of the WPP Group, acquired two agencies for undisclosed terms: the Rockey Company in Seattle, a public relations and public affairs agency, and SocketPR in Atlanta, specializing in technology and e-business public relations.
